GK18bharnatu:4374: ahnaḥ pramāṇaṃ gatvā tu kāryalābhaṃ vinirdiśed /

GK18bharnatu:4488: dharmī yā dvividhā proktā mayā pūrvaṃ dvijottamāḥ /

GK18bharnatu:4545: ña ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa ta tha da dha na pa pha ba bha ma ya ra la va

GK18bharnatu:4827: śeṣāṇi tu gurūṇi syurmālinī sā matā yathā // BhN_15.7 //

GK18bharnatu:4836: sau trikau yadi pāde hyantimaśca gakāraḥ /

GK18bharnatu:4913: kiṃ tvayā kumatisaṅgayā sadā nājñayeva suhṛdāṃ priyaṃ kṛtam /

GK18bharnatu:4919: āgatāsi bhavanaṃ mama yasmātsvāgataṃ tava varoru niṣīda // BhN_15.50 //
GK18bharnatu:4920: ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca navamaṃ caiva laghunī traiṣṭubhe yadi /

GK18bharnatu:4922: duḥśīlaṃ vā nirguṇaṃ vāparaṃ vā loke dhairyādapriyaṃ na bravīṣi /

GK18bharnatu:4925: gurūṇi jāgate pāde yatra tattoṭakaṃ bhavet // BhN_15.53 //
GK18bharnatu:4926: yadi so 'tra bhavettu samudrasamastriṣu cāpi tathā niyamena yatiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4927: satataṃ jagatīvihitaṃ hi tataṃ gaditaṃ khalu toṭakavṛttamidam // BhN_15.54 //

GK18bharnatu:4933: yau trikau tathā nyau yadi khalu pāde ṣaḍbhireva varṇairyadi ca yatiḥ syāt /

GK18bharnatu:4937: nindyamadya kiṃ tvaṃ vigalitaśobhā candrapādayuktā kumudavatī ca // BhN_15.58 //

GK18bharnatu:4942: kumudanibhā tvaṃ kāmabāṇaviddhā kimasi natabhrūḥ śītavātadagdhā /
GK18bharnatu:4943: mṛdunalinīvāpāṇḍuvaktraśobhā kathamapi jātā hyagrataḥ sakhīnām // BhN_15.60 //
GK18bharnatu:4945: ādau pañcākṣaracchedaścandralekhā tu sā yathā // BhN_15.61 //
GK18bharnatu:4946: vaktraṃ saumyaṃ te padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ kāmasyāvāsaṃ sunāsoccaprahāsam /

GK18bharnatu:4949: dvādaśākṣarake pāde yatra sā pramitākṣarā // BhN_15.63 //

GK18bharnatu:4957: na me priyā tvaṃ bahumānavarjitāṃ priyaṃ priyā te paruṣābhibhāṣiṇī /

GK18bharnatu:4963: saptamaṃ navamaṃ cāntyamupāntyaṃ ca yadā guru /
GK18bharnatu:4964: dvādaśākṣarake pāde kāmadatteti sā yathā // BhN_15.70 //
GK18bharnatu:4965: karajapadavibhūṣitā yathā tvaṃ sudati daśanavikṣatādharā ca /

GK18bharnatu:4967: ādyaṃ caturthaṃ daśamaṃ saptamaṃ ca yadā laghu /
GK18bharnatu:4968: pāde tu jāgate yasyā aprameyā tu sā yathā // BhN_15.72 //

GK18bharnatu:4972: pāde yatra laghūni syuḥ padminī nāma sā yathā // BhN_15.74 //
GK18bharnatu:4973: rāstrikāḥ sāgarākhyā niviṣṭā yadā syāt trike ca trike yuktarūpā yatiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4974: sanniviṣṭā jagatyāstatassā budhair nāmataścāpi saṃkīrtyate padminī // BhN_15.75 //
GK18bharnatu:4976: keśapāśacchadā cakravākastanī padminīva priye bhāsi me sarvadā // BhN_15.76 //

GK18bharnatu:4986: vicchedo 'tijagatyāṃ tu caturbhiḥ sā prabhāvatī // BhN_15.81 //
GK18bharnatu:4987: kathaṃ nvidaṃ kamalaviśālalocane gṛhaṃ dhanaiḥ pihitakare divākare /
GK18bharnatu:4992: śobhāḍhyairharasi manāṃsi kāmukānāṃ suvyaktaṃ hyatijagatī praharṣiṇī ca // BhN_15.84 //

GK18bharnatu:5023: yadā ymau pādasthau bhavata iha cetstau tathā gau tathā ṣaḍbhiścānyairyatirapi ca varṇairyathā syāt /
GK18bharnatu:5024: tadapyaṣṭau nityaṃ samanugatamevoktamanyaiḥ prayogajñairvṛttaṃ pravaralalitaṃ nāmatastu // BhN_15.99 //

GK18bharnatu:5033: mahānadyā bhogaṃ pulinamiva bhāti te jaghanaṃ tathāsyaṃ netrāḍhyaṃ bhramarasahitaṃ paṅkajamiva /

GK18bharnatu:5037: yadi hi caraṇe nsau slau gaḥ kramādviniveśitār yadi khalu yatiḥ ṣaḍbhirvarṇairstathā daśabhiḥ punaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5038: yadi vihitaṃ syādatyaṣṭiḥ prayogasukhāśrayaṃ vṛṣabhalalitaṃ vṛttaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā hariṇīti vā // BhN_15.105 //
GK18bharnatu:5040: jaladhararavaṃ śrutvā śrutvā madocchrayadarpito vilikhitamahīśṛṅgākṣepairvṛṣaiḥ pratinardya ca /
GK18bharnatu:5041: svayuvativṛto goṣṭhādgoṣṭhaṃ prayāti ca nirbhayo vṛṣabhalalitaṃ citraṃ vṛttaṃ karoti ca śādvale // BhN_15.106 //
GK18bharnatu:5042: catvāryādau ca daśamaṃ guru yatra trayodaśaṃ caturdaśaṃ tathāntye dve caikādaśamathāpi ca // BhN_15.107 //

GK18bharnatu:5045: mo bhnau ca syuścaraṇaracitāstau gurū ca praviṣṭāśchedaḥ śiṣṭo yadi ca daśabhiḥ syāttathānyaiścaturbhiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5046: atyaṣṭau ca pratiniyamitā varṇataḥ spaṣṭarūpā sā vijñeyā dvijamunigaṇaiḥ śrīdharī nāmatastu // BhN_15.109 //
GK18bharnatu:5047: snānaiścūrṇaiḥ sukhasurabhibhirgandhavāsaiśca dhūpaiḥ puṣpaiścānyaiḥ śirasi racitairvastrayogaiśca taistaiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5049: ādyaṃ caturthaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca daśamaṃ naidhanaṃ guru /
GK18bharnatu:5051: yathā eṣa gajo 'drimastakataṭe kalabhaparivṛtaḥ krīḍati vṛkṣagulmagahane kusumabhiranate /
GK18bharnatu:5052: megharavaṃ niśamya muditaḥ pavanajavasamaḥ sundari vaṃśapatrapatitaṃ punarapi kurute // BhN_15.112 //
GK18bharnatu:5055: bhavanti yatra dīrghāṇi śeṣāṇi ca laghūnyatha /

GK18bharnatu:5057: yadā dviruditau hi pādamabhisaṃśritau jsau trikau tathaiva ca punastayornidhanamāśritau yau lagau /
GK18bharnatu:5058: tadaṣṭiratipūrvikā yatirapi svabhāvādyathā vilambitagatistadā nigaditā dvijairnāmataḥ // BhN_15.115 //
GK18bharnatu:5061: na me priyamidaṃ janasya bahumānarāgeṇa yanmadena vivaśā vilambitagatiḥ kṛtā tvaṃ priye // BhN_15.116 //
GK18bharnatu:5063: caturdaśaṃ tathāntye dve citralekhā dhṛtau smṛtā // BhN_15.117 //
GK18bharnatu:5065: keśaiḥ snānāḍhyaiḥ kusumabharitairvastrarāgaiśca taistaiḥ kānte saṃkṣepāt kimiha bahunā citralekheva bhāsi // BhN_15.118 //
GK18bharnatu:5067: trayodaśaṃ dvādaśaṃ ca ṣaṣṭhamaṣṭamameva ca // BhN_15.119 //
GK18bharnatu:5069: pāde laghūni śeṣāṇi śārdūlakrīḍitaṃ tu tat // BhN_15.120 //
GK18bharnatu:5070: msau jsau tau guru ca prayoganiyatā yasminniviṣṭāstrikā ādyā cāntyayatiścatustrikayutā jñeyā parā saptabhiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5071: nityaṃ yatpadamāśritā hyatidhṛtirnityaṃ kavīnāṃ priyaṃ tajjñeyaṃ khalu vṛttajātinipuṇaiḥ śārdūlavikrīḍitam // BhN_15.121 //
GK18bharnatu:5074: dhairyotsāhaparākramaprabhṛtibhistaistairvicitrairguṇair vṛttaṃ te ripughāti bhāti samare śārdūlavikrīḍitam // BhN_15.122 //
GK18bharnatu:5075: tāvattvaṃ vijitendriyaḥ śubhamate sarvātmanā pratyahaṃ dāne śīlavidhau ca yojaya manaḥ svargāpavargāpaham /
GK18bharnatu:5076: yāvad vyādhijarāpracaṇḍanakharo vyāyatsaṭābhirbhṛśaṃ mṛtyuste na karoti jīvitamṛgaiḥ śārdūlavikrīḍitam // BhN_15.123 //
GK18bharnatu:5077: catvāryādau ca ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca saptamaṃ sacaturdaśam /
GK18bharnatu:5078: tathā pañcadaśaṃ caiva ṣiḍaśaṃ naidhanaṃ tathā // BhN_15.124 //
GK18bharnatu:5079: etāni ca gurūṇi syuḥ śeṣāṇi tu laghūnyatha /
GK18bharnatu:5080: pāde yatra kṛtau jñeyā nāmnā suvadanā tu sā // BhN_15.125 //
GK18bharnatu:5081: mrau mnau ybhau lgau ca samyagyadi ca viracitāḥ pāde kramavaśād vicchedaḥ saptabhiḥ syātpunarapi ca yatiḥ saptākṣarakṛtā /
GK18bharnatu:5082: yadyeṣā saṃśritā syātkṛtimapi ca punaḥ śliṣṭākṣarapadā vidvadbhirvṛttajātau tata iha gaditā nāmnā suvadanā // BhN_15.126 //
GK18bharnatu:5084: netre līlālasānte kamaladalanibhe bhrūcāpavinate raktoṣṭhaṃ pīnamadhyaṃ samasahitaghanāḥ snigdhāśca daśanāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5085: karṇāvaṃsapralambau cibukamapi nataṃ ghoṇā surucirā vyaktaṃ tvaṃ martyaloke varatanu vihitāsyekā suvadanā // BhN_15.127 //
GK18bharnatu:5086: catvāryādau tathā ṣaṣṭhaṃ saptamaṃ ca caturdaśam /
GK18bharnatu:5087: aṣṭādaśaṃ saptadaśaṃ tathā pañcadaśaṃ punaḥ // BhN_15.128 //
GK18bharnatu:5089: ekaviṃśatike pāde sragdharā nāma sā yathā // BhN_15.129 //
GK18bharnatu:5090: mrau mnau yau yaśca samyagyadi hi viracitāḥ syustrikāḥ pādayoge varṇaiḥ pūrvopadiṣṭairyatirapi ca punaḥ saptabhiḥ saptabhiḥ syāt /
GK18bharnatu:5091: vṛttaṃ samyagyadi syātprakṛtimanugataṃ tatvavidbhiḥ pradiṣṭaṃ vijñeyaṃ vṛttajātau kavijanadayitā sragdharā nāmatastu // BhN_15.130 //
GK18bharnatu:5093: cūtāśokāravindaiḥ kuravakatilakaiḥ karṇikāraiḥ śirīṣaiḥ punnāgaiḥ pārijātairvakulakuvalayaiḥ kiṃśukaiḥ sātimuktaiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5094: etairnānāprakāraiḥ bahulasurabhibhirviprakīrṇaiśca taistair vāsantaiḥ puṣpavṛndairnaravara vasudhā sragdharevādya bhāti // BhN_15.131 //
GK18bharnatu:5095: caturthamādyaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca daśamaṃ dvādaśaṃ tathā /
GK18bharnatu:5096: ṣoḍaśāṣṭādaśe caiva naidhanaṃ ca gurūṇyatha // BhN_15.132 //
GK18bharnatu:5098: bhavanti yatra tajjñeyaṃ bhadrakaṃ nāmato yathā // BhN_15.133 //
GK18bharnatu:5099: bhrau caraṇe yadā viniyatau trikau kramavaśādathātikṛtividhau nrau ca tataḥ paraṃ ca rucirāvanantarakṛtau nagāvapi punaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5100: tacca daśāṣṭavarṇaracitā caturṣvapi tathā yatiśca satataṃ bhadrakavṛttameva khalu nāṭyayogakuśalairbudhairnigaditam // BhN_15.134 //
GK18bharnatu:5102: bhadrakametadadya subhage vidagdhagaticeṣṭitaiḥ sulalitair nṛtyasi vibhramākulapadaṃ viviktarasabhāvitaṃ śaśimukhi // BhN_15.135 //
GK18bharnatu:5104: ekādaśaṃ saptadaśaṃ pañcamaṃ ca gurūṇyatha // BhN_15.136 //
GK18bharnatu:5106: vṛttaṃ tadaśvalalitaṃ vijñeyaṃ nāmato yathā // BhN_15.137 //
GK18bharnatu:5107: yadi ca nakāra ādiracitaḥ pade viracito 'nta eva lagau yadi ca nabhau tridhā ca nihitau krameṇa khalu madhyāvapi tathā /
GK18bharnatu:5108: yadi ca samāśritaṃ hi vikṛtiṃ yatiśca daśabhistathaikasahitais tata iha kīrtitaṃ munigaṇairviśuddhacaritaistadaśvalalitam // BhN_15.138 //
GK18bharnatu:5110: ripuśatamuktaśastraravabhītaśaṅkitabhaṭaṃ bhayākuladiśaṃ kṛtamabhivīkṣya saṃyugamukhe samarpitaguṇaṃ tvayāśvalalitam // BhN_15.139 //
GK18bharnatu:5112: viṃśaṃ saptadaśaṃ caiva trayoviṃśaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_15.140 //
GK18bharnatu:5113: etāni ca laghūni syuḥ śeṣāṇyatha gurūṇi ca /
GK18bharnatu:5114: caturviṃśatike pāde meghamāleti sā yathā // BhN_15.141 //
GK18bharnatu:5115: yadi khalu caraṇasthitau nau trikau kṛtikāravyāstathā rāḥ syuḥ kramāt /
GK18bharnatu:5116: bhavati yadi yatistathā saptabhiḥ saptabhistriṣvato 'nyā yatiḥ pañca vidyāttathā // BhN_15.142 //
GK18bharnatu:5118: surapatidhanurujjvalābaddhakakṣyā taḍiddyotasannāhapaṭṭījvalā gaganatalavisāriṇī prāvṛṣaṇyā dṛḍhaṃ meghamālādhikaṃ śobhate // BhN_15.143 //
GK18bharnatu:5119: ādyaṃ caiva caturthaṃ ca pañcamaṃ ṣaṣṭhameva ca /
GK18bharnatu:5120: navamaṃ daśamaṃ caiva naidhanaṃ ca bhavedguru // BhN_15.144 //
GK18bharnatu:5122: vṛttajjñaiḥ sā tu vijñeyā krauñcapādīti nāmataḥ // BhN_15.145 //
GK18bharnatu:5123: bhmau yadi pāde sbhāvapi ceṣṭāvabhikṛtirapi ca hi yadi khalu vihitā nāśca samudrāḥ syurviniviṣṭā yadi ca khalu guru bhavati nidhanagatam /
GK18bharnatu:5124: pañcabhirādau chedamupetā punarapi yatiriha yadi khalu daśabhiḥ krauñcapadeyaṃ vṛttavidhāne suragaṇapitṛgaṇamunigaṇavihitā // BhN_15.146 //
GK18bharnatu:5125: yaḥ kila dākṣaṃ vidrutasomaṃ kratuvaramacamasamapagatakalaśaṃ pātitayūpaṃ kṣiptacaṣālaṃ vicayanamasamidhamapaśukacarukam /
GK18bharnatu:5126: kārmukamuktenāśu cakāra vyapagatasuragaṇapitṛgaṇamiṣuṇā nityamasau te daityagaṇāriḥ pradahatu makhamiva ripugaṇamakhilam // BhN_15.147 //
GK18bharnatu:5127: yā kapilākṣī piṅgalakeśī kaliruciranudinamanunayakaṭhinā dīrghatarābhiḥ sthūlasirābhiḥ parivṛtavapuratiśayakuṭilagatiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5128: āyatajaṅghā nimnakapolā laghutarakucayugaparigatahṛdayā sā parihāryā krauñcapadā strī dhruvamiha niravadhisukhamabhilaṣatā // BhN_15.148 //
GK18bharnatu:5130: ekaviṃśaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ caturviṃśaṃ sanaidhanam // BhN_15.149 //
GK18bharnatu:5131: etāni guru saṃkhyāni śeṣāṇi ca laghūnyatha /
GK18bharnatu:5133: yasyāṃ mau to nāḥ strau nityaṃ praticaraṇamatha
GK18bharnatu:5151: meghamālādikaṃ tatsyānnau cādau kāguhā trikāḥ // BhN_15.153 //
GK18bharnatu:5156: muditajalacarākulāḥ saṃprakīrṇamalāḥ kīrtayantīva kīrtiṃ mahānimnagāḥ // BhN_15.154 //
GK18bharnatu:5160: grathitāḥ pādayogena tad vṛttaṃ viṣamaṃ smṛtam // BhN_15.156 //
GK18bharnatu:5161: dvau samaṃ dvau ca viṣamau vṛtte 'rdhaviṣame tathā /
GK18bharnatu:5165: pāde siddhe samaṃ siddhaṃ viṣamaṃ sārvapādikam /
GK18bharnatu:5170: dvitīye caraṇe ca syādityanuṣṭup samāsataḥ // BhN_15.161 //
GK18bharnatu:5171: sau gau tu prathame pāde srau lgau cāpi dvitīyake /
GK18bharnatu:5172: yugme 'rdhaviṣame pāde jñeyā pathyā tu sā trikaiḥ // BhN_15.162 //
GK18bharnatu:5174: priyadānaratā pathyā dayite tvaṃ priyāsi me // BhN_15.163 //
GK18bharnatu:5175: mrau gau tu prathame pāde ysau lgau ca dvitīyake /
GK18bharnatu:5176: pāde bhau lgau tṛtīye ca caturthe tu tasau lagau // BhN_15.164 //
GK18bharnatu:5177: naivācāro na te mitraṃ na saṃbandhiguṇapriyā /
GK18bharnatu:5178: sarvathā sarvaviṣamā pathyā na bhavasi priye // BhN_15.165 //
GK18bharnatu:5180: pathyā hi viparītā sā vijñeyā nāmato yathā // BhN_15.166 //
GK18bharnatu:5181: kṛtena ramaṇasya kiṃ sakhi roṣeṇa te 'pyartham /
GK18bharnatu:5182: viparītā na pathyāsi tvaṃ jaḍe kena mohitā // BhN_15.167 //
GK18bharnatu:5184: anuṣṭupcapalā sā tu vijñeyā nāmato yathā // BhN_15.168 //
GK18bharnatu:5185: na khalvasyāḥ priyatamaḥ śrotavyaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ sakhyā /
GK18bharnatu:5186: nāradasya pratikṛtiḥ kathyate capalā hīyam // BhN_15.169 //
GK18bharnatu:5187: vipulā tu yuji jñeyā laghutvātsaptamasya tu /
GK18bharnatu:5208: kva yāsyasi varoru suratakāle viṣamā kiṃ vānavāsikā tvam // BhN_15.180 //
GK18bharnatu:5209: sjau sgau ca prathame pāde tathā caiva tṛtīyake /
GK18bharnatu:5210: ketumatyāṃ gaṇāḥ proktāḥ bhrau ngau gaśca sadā budhaiḥ // BhN_15.181 //
GK18bharnatu:5212: kimidaṃ ruṣāpahṛtaśobhaṃ ketumatīsamaṃ vada mukhaṃ te // BhN_15.182 //
GK18bharnatu:5213: vaktrasyāparapūrvasya cādau nau ro lagau trikāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5214: najau rajau dvitīye ca śeṣāgraṃ punareva tu // BhN_15.183 //
GK18bharnatu:5215: prathame ca tṛtīye nau ralau gaśca prakīrtitaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5216: gaṇāścāparavaktre tu najau jrau dvicaturthayoḥ // BhN_15.184 //
GK18bharnatu:5218: kimidamaparavaktrameva te śaśivadane 'dya mukhaṃ parāṅmukham // BhN_15.185 //
GK18bharnatu:5219: nau yau tu prathame pāde njau jrau gaśca tathāpare /
GK18bharnatu:5220: yatra tatpuṣpitāgrā syādyadi śeṣaṃ tu pūrvavat // BhN_15.186 //
GK18bharnatu:5222: madhukaraparigīyamānaśabdaṃ varatanu paśya vanaṃ supuṣpitāgram // BhN_15.187 //
GK18bharnatu:5223: sjau slau cādau yathā nsau jgau bhnau jlau gaśca tathā punaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5224: sjau sjau gaśca trikā hyete udgatāyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // BhN_15.188 //
GK18bharnatu:5227: sjau slau ca tato nsau jgau nau sau ceti tṛtīyake /
GK18bharnatu:5228: sjau sjau gaśca caturthe tu lalitāyā gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // BhN_15.190 //
GK18bharnatu:5234: na ca tāni prayojyāni na śobhāṃ janayanti hi // BhN_15.193 //
GK18bharnatu:5236: dhruvāyoge tu vakṣyāmi teṣāṃ caiva vikalpanam // BhN_15.194 //
GK18bharnatu:5238: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi hyāryāṇāmapi lakṣaṇam // BhN_15.195 //
GK18bharnatu:5239: pathyā ca vipulā caiva caṣalā mukhato 'parā /
GK18bharnatu:5240: jaghane capalā caiva āryāḥ pañca prakīrtitāḥ // BhN_15.196 //
GK18bharnatu:5244: dvitīyāntyau yujau pādāvayujau tvaparau smṛtau // BhN_15.198 //
GK18bharnatu:5248: paścādardhe tu ṣaṣṭhaḥ syādekamātrastu kevalaḥ // BhN_15.200 //
GK18bharnatu:5249: dvivikalpastu ṣaṣṭho yo gurumadhyo bhavettu saḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5252: prathamādirathāntye ca pañcame vā vidhīyate // BhN_15.202 //
GK18bharnatu:5253: gaṇeṣu triṣu pādasya yasyāḥ pathyā tu sā bhavet /
GK18bharnatu:5254: ataśca vipulānyā tu vijñeyā yatilakṣaṇā // BhN_15.203 //
GK18bharnatu:5256: yasyāḥ syuḥ pādayoge tu vijñeyā capalā hi sā // BhN_15.204 //
GK18bharnatu:5265: paścādvā yo gaṇaḥ ṣaṣṭha ekamātraḥ sa ucyate /
GK18bharnatu:5266: dvivikalpastu yaḥ ṣaṣṭho gurumadhyo bhavettu saḥ // BhN_15.209 //
GK18bharnatu:5268: sā dvitīyā dvilaghukā saptame prathame yatiḥ // BhN_15.210 //
GK18bharnatu:5270: ayuggaṇo vidhātavyaḥ yuggaṇastu sa eva ca // BhN_15.211 //
GK18bharnatu:5271: prathamatṛtīyau pādau dvādaśamātrau bhavettu sā pathyā /
GK18bharnatu:5275: kasya tu pṛthumṛdujaghanā tanubāhvaṃ sodarī pathyā // BhN_15.213 //
GK18bharnatu:5283: pūrvārdhe lakṣaṇaṃ hyetadasyāḥ sa ca mukhena tu /
GK18bharnatu:5284: paścimārdhe tu capalā yasyāḥ sā jaghanena tu // BhN_15.217 //
GK18bharnatu:5286: āryāmukhe tu capalā tathāpi cāryā na me yataḥ sā kim /
GK18bharnatu:5287: dakṣā gṛhakṛtyeṣu tathā duḥkhe bhavati duḥkhārtā // BhN_15.218 //
GK18bharnatu:5292: vṛttajñaiḥ sā tu vijñeyā sarvataścapalā sakhi // BhN_15.220 //
GK18bharnatu:5294: aṣṭādaśa dvitīyaṃ ca tathā pañcadaśottamā // BhN_15.221 //
GK18bharnatu:5300: śeṣāṇi gurusaṃkhyāni hyevaṃ sarvatra nirdiśet // BhN_15.224 //
GK18bharnatu:5314: āśīḥ priyoktiḥ kapaṭaḥ kṣamā ca prāptiśca paścāttapanaṃ tathaiva /
GK18bharnatu:5316: ṣaṭtriṃśadetāni hi lakṣaṇāni proktāni vai bhūṣaṇasaṃmitāni /
GK18bharnatu:5317: kāvyeṣu bhāvārthagatāni tajjñaiḥ samyag prayojyāni yathārasaṃ tu // BhN_16.4 //
GK18bharnatu:5325: na yaḥ paryavatiṣṭheta so 'bhimānastu saṃjñitaḥ // BhN_16.8 //
GK18bharnatu:5327: doṣā na parikathyante tajjñeyaṃ guṇakīrtanam // BhN_16.9 //
GK18bharnatu:5331: prasiddhairupagūḍhaṃ ca jñeyaṃ protsāhanaṃ budhaiḥ // BhN_16.11 //
GK18bharnatu:5334: niruktaṃ dvividhaṃ proktaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyameva vā /
GK18bharnatu:5337: uttamārthaviśeṣo yaḥ sa cāpyatiśayaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhN_16.14 //
GK18bharnatu:5344: bahūnāṃ tu pradhānānāṃ madhye yannāma kīrtyate /
GK18bharnatu:5349: tīvrārthabhāṣaṇaṃ yatsyādākrandaḥ sa tu kīrtitaḥ // BhN_16.20 //
GK18bharnatu:5355: yattu priyaṃ punarvākyaṃ sā yāñcā parikīrtitā // BhN_16.23 //
GK18bharnatu:5357: nivāryate ca kāryajjñaiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_16.24 //
GK18bharnatu:5361: nidarśanakṛtastajjñaiḥ sa dṛṣṭānta iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_16.26 //
GK18bharnatu:5373: akrodhaḥ krodhajananairvākyairyaḥ sā kṣamā bhavet // BhN_16.32 //
GK18bharnatu:5377: santāpo manaso yastu paścāttāpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_16.34 //
GK18bharnatu:5380: prāptānāṃ yatra doṣāṇāṃ kriyate śamanaṃ punaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5381: sā jñeyā hyupapattistu lakṣaṇaṃ nāṭakāśrayam // BhN_16.36 //
GK18bharnatu:5385: guṇābhivādaṃ doṣān vā kāryaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ viduḥ // BhN_16.38 //
GK18bharnatu:5389: anyatrārthena sambaddhaṃ jñeyaṃ tat paridevanam // BhN_16.40 //
GK18bharnatu:5390: upamā rūpakaṃ caiva dīpakaṃ yamakaṃ tathā /
GK18bharnatu:5393: upamā nāma sā jñeyā guṇākṛtisamāśrayā // BhN_16.42 //
GK18bharnatu:5397: śaśāṅkavat prakāśante jyotīṃṣīti bhavettu yā // BhN_16.44 //
GK18bharnatu:5401: bahūnāṃ bahubhirjñeyā ghanā iva gajā iti // BhN_16.46 //
GK18bharnatu:5402: praśaṃsā caiva nindā ca kalpitā sadṛśī tathā /
GK18bharnatu:5403: yā kiñcitsadṛśī jñeyā sopamā pañcadhā budhaiḥ // BhN_16.47 //
GK18bharnatu:5405: dṛṣṭvā tu tāṃ viśālākṣīṃ tutoṣa manujādhipaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5406: munibhiḥ sādhitāṃ kṛcchrāt siddhiṃ mūrtimatīmiva // BhN_16.48 //
GK18bharnatu:5409: vane kaṇṭakinaṃ vallī dāvadagdhamiva drumam // BhN_16.49 //
GK18bharnatu:5412: mataṅgajā virājante jaṅgamā iva parvatāḥ // BhN_16.50 //
GK18bharnatu:5420: śeṣā ye lakṣaṇairnoktāste grāhyāḥ kāvyalokataḥ // BhN_16.53 //
GK18bharnatu:5426: sarāṃsi haṃsaiḥ kusumaiśca vṛkṣā mattairdvirephaiśca saroruhāṇi /
GK18bharnatu:5427: goṣṭhībhirudyānavanāni caiva tasminnaśūnyāni sadā kriyante // BhN_16.56 //
GK18bharnatu:5429: kiñcitsādṛśyasampannaṃ yadrūpaṃ rūpakaṃ tu tat // BhN_16.57 //
GK18bharnatu:5444: tadvai pādāntayamakaṃ vijñeyaṃ nāmato yathā // BhN_16.64 //
GK18bharnatu:5451: pādasyānte tathā cādau syātāṃ yatra same pade /
GK18bharnatu:5456: rāmā rāmā vismayate ca smayate ca // BhN_16.68 //
GK18bharnatu:5463: ekaikaṃ pādamutkramya dvau pādau sadṛśau yadi /
GK18bharnatu:5465: sa pūrvaṃ vāraṇo bhūtvā dviśṛṅga iva parvataḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5468: cakravaccakravālaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ nāmato yathā // BhN_16.73 //
GK18bharnatu:5471: śailā yathā śatrubhirāhatā hatā hatāśca bhūyastvanupuṅkhapuṅkhagaiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5473: ādau dvau yatra pādau tu bhavetāmakṣare samau /
GK18bharnatu:5475: paśya paśya ramaṇasya me guṇān yena yena vaśagāṃ karoti mām /
GK18bharnatu:5476: yena yena hi sameti darśanaṃ tena tena vaśagāṃ karoti mām // BhN_16.77 //
GK18bharnatu:5477: ādau pādasya tu yatra syāt samāveśaḥ samākṣaraḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5479: viṣṇuḥ sṛjati bhūtāni viṣṇuḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5482: jñeyamāmreḍitaṃ nāma yamakaṃ tatra sūribhiḥ // BhN_16.80 //
GK18bharnatu:5483: vijṛmbhitaṃ niḥśvasitaṃ muhurmuhuḥ kathaṃ vidheyaṃ smaraṇaṃ pade pade /
GK18bharnatu:5484: yathā ca te dhyānamidaṃ punaḥ punardhuvaṃgatā te rajanī vinā vinā // BhN_16.81 //
GK18bharnatu:5485: sarve pādāḥ samā yatra bhavanti niyatākṣarāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5491: lalī balī halī mālī khelī mālī salī jalī /
GK18bharnatu:5492: khalo balo 'balo mālī musalī tvābhirakṣatu // BhN_16.85 //
GK18bharnatu:5493: asau hi rāmā rativigrahapriyā rahaḥpragalbhā ramaṇaṃ manogatam /
GK18bharnatu:5494: ratena rātriṃ ramayet pareṇa vā na cedudeṣyattaruṇaḥ paro ripuḥ // BhN_16.86 //
GK18bharnatu:5496: kṣatairgavākṣairiva saṃvṛtājñaḥ sākṣāt sahasrākṣa ivāvabhāti // BhN_16.87 //
GK18bharnatu:5498: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi kāvye doṣān guṇāṃstathā // BhN_16.88 //
GK18bharnatu:5500: nyāyāvapetaṃ viṣamaṃ visandhi śabdacyutaṃ vai daśa kāvyadoṣāḥ // BhN_16.89 //
GK18bharnatu:5506: bhinnārthaṃ tadapi prāhuḥ kāvyaṃ kāvyavicakṣaṇāḥ // BhN_16.92 //
